name: Glitch Balls
description:
Right Trigger - Left Mouse = Attack

Left Trigger - Left Shift =Boost

Right bumper - Q = Leap Slam

Left Bumper - Right Click = Dodge

X (Xbox) - E = Interact (This includes interacting within the inventory)

Menu button - Tab = Open/Close Inventory(edited)

Press Y (Xbox) for some slow mo fun

A - Space bar = Jump

Start button - Esc or P = Pause
